General.Name: Avadh Sugar & Energy Limited
General.Description: Avadh Sugar & Energy Limited manufactures and sells sugar, molasses, bagasse, and press-mud in India. It operates through Sugar, Distillery, Co-generation, and Others segments. The company offers sugar, tea, molasses, industrial alcohol, ethanol, bio-compost, canned food, and fruit related products. In addition, it manufactures and sells industrial spirits, including ethanol, as well as fusel oil; and generates and transmits power. Further, the company trades in petroleum products. Avadh Sugar & Energy Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
